Sentinel Gartrandell:
May the stars guide your way! My name is Gartrandell, and I'm guarding this forest and the Mother Tree. During the war with the Dark Elves I was heavily wounded, so they sent me to reserves and ordered to guard Eva's Shrines.
This is the heritage of the great Elven culture, so I'm proud of the trust placed in me. Also, the work here lets me see my beloved more often.
